title: Rily.co Social Media Growth
subtitle: From 150 to 36,000+ followers: A 3-year content strategy success story
summary: A comprehensive content strategy that grew Rily.co from 150 to over 36,000 Instagram followers, establishing them as a leading voice in allergy-friendly cooking.
challenge: Rily.co, a recipe startup for people with health conditions and allergies, needed to build brand awareness and community in a crowded wellness space.
solution: We developed a long-term content strategy focused on monthly recipe videos, chef profiles, and authentic storytelling that resonated with their niche audience.
results: Vast library of engaging video content
Established thought leadership in allergy-friendly cooking
3+ years of sustained partnership and growth

sections.content: When Rily.co approached us in 2020, they were a recipe startup with a powerful mission but limited reach. Serving people with health conditions and allergies, they needed to build trust and community in a space where authenticity matters most.

sections.title: The Challenge
sections.content: How do you build a loyal community around specialized dietary needs while standing out in an oversaturated wellness market?

Our approach focused on consistent, high-quality content that showcased both recipes and the stories behind them. We partnered with Nina Gilmour as producer to create a sustainable content pipeline that could grow with their brand.

sections.alt: Behind the scenes of Rily recipe video production
sections.caption: Behind the scenes: Creating authentic recipe content for the allergy-friendly community

sections.content: We established a monthly production rhythm that balanced recipe showcases with chef profiles, creating a diverse content library that served multiple audience needs and engagement patterns.

items: Monthly recipe videos with step-by-step guidance
Chef profiles highlighting diverse culinary voices

sections.content: Over three years, we've helped Rily.co build one of the most engaged communities in the allergy-friendly cooking space. Their growth has been both substantial and sustainable, with authentic engagement driving real business results.

sections.title: Key Insight
sections.content: Sustainable growth comes from understanding your audience's deeper needs. In wellness, authenticity and consistency matter more than viral moments.
